main.commit_message:
Small lexical fixes in CMakeLists.txt

Signed-off-by: Klaus Kämpf <kkaempf@suse.de>

openwsman: OpenWsmanClient: add AllowSelfSignedServerCert method

Co-authored-by: Katz, Nechama <nechama.katz@intel.com>
Signed-off-by: Debel, Erel <erel.debel@intel.com>
Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: wsmc_handler: clear previous flags if not verifying host or peer

Co-authored-by: Katz, Nechama <nechama.katz@intel.com>
Signed-off-by: Debel, Erel <erel.debel@intel.com>
Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

Cleanup lock/unlock in xml serializer

Signed-off-by: Klaus Kämpf <kkaempf@suse.de>

openwsman: wsman-soap-envelope: initilize enum variable with enum value

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: wsman-soap-envelope: drop unused assignment

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: wsman-client: drop unused assignment

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: wsman-xml-serialize: fix lock initialize

Pass lock variable into initialize function, not the whole object.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: wsman-soap: avoid double lock

ws_remove_context_val takes context lock.
Do not lock it in caller.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: wsman-libxml2-binding: check strdup for NULL

Check strdup result to avoid NULL dereference.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: wsman-filter: check alloc result

Check alloc result for NULL and bail out top avoid NULL dereference.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: wsman-epr: move variables to the beginning of function

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: wsman-dispatcher: ensure that buf is not NULL

ensure that buf is not NULL before using it

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: wsman-client: check result of alloc

Avoid NULL-dereference by chekcing result of alloc.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: wsman-client: drop unused assignment

node is not used after assignment.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: wsman-client: drop second node null-check

The node variable checked for NULL couple of linse above.
Drop not needed second check.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: wsman-client: drop null check before u_uri_free

u_uri_free checks it parameter  - no need to check twice.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: wsman-client: fix call to u_uri_parse

No need to allocate uri struct as u_uri_parse allocates it.
The struct allocated outside is leaked.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: use enum values instead of plain one for enum variables

Impeove code readability by using values from enum instead of
plane integers in enum variables.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: uoption: fix code offset

Improve code readability by fixing code block offset.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: pthreadx_win32: fix variable type

_beginthreadex required unsigned int parameter, not DWORD.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: protect classes from self-assignment

Do not copy data if object is self-assigned.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: OpenWsmanClient: drop unused XmlDocToString

XmlDocToString function is unused, remove it.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: OpenWsmanClient: remove unused function declaration

SetOptions is forward-declared but does not exists and not used.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: wsman-client: cleanup serializer

Cleanup serializer in client release.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: error out on failed strdup

Bail out if strdup failed.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: wsman-client: error out on failed alloc

Check results of alloc/strdup and bail out with error if it failed.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: wsman-client: initilize pointer

Initialize pointer to null for the case where ws_xml_dump_memory_node_tree
do not initilize it.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: check for alloc failure

Avoid NULL derefernce.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: wsman-client: check for strdup failures

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: uri: bail out on alloc failure

Avoid NULL-dereferencing by bailing out on failed malloc.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: wsman-soap: clean leak in error path

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: wsman-win-client-transport: remove unused Auth2Scheme

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: wsman-win-client-transport: use char for cert valiation

Certificate parameters should be always char.
Replace _TCHAR with CHAR and use CertGetNameStringA.
Drop const from one of parameters as target function also has no const
there.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: wsman-soap: check result of lnode_create

Bail out if lnode_create failed.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: wsman-soap: drop unused variable

Drop unused data variable.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: wsman-soap: fix alloc size

Alloc struct size, not the pointer size.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>

openwsman: wsman-soap-envelope: unshadow variable

Rename index variable that shadows function parameter.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Usyskin <alexander.usyskin@intel.com>
drop python 3.7, already EOLed

Adds Python 3.11 support

* Also removes EOL 3.x versions of Python
